pr_title: Ignore non-literal arg names in LogsafeArgName

timeline.message: Ignore non-literal arg names in LogsafeArgName

timeline.bodyText: nit: we might as well combine these two conditional expressions.
timeline.author: carterkozak

replies.bodyText: We can just get rid of the compile time constant matcher, right? All literals are compile time constants.
replies.author: pkoenig10
